title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 13 January 2015 - XWiki

09:15 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki  
09:15 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
09:27 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
09:36 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
09:39 <Lyes> has joined #xwiki  
09:42 <mflorea> There are 2 remaining failing tests, one in wysiwyg and one in extension. I'm looking at them. As for the ui tests, the failures have been caused by a cache failure which needs to be investigated.  
10:01 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
10:07 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
10:07 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
10:08 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
10:08 <fmancinelli> has joined #xwiki  
10:39 <vmassol> ClemensR: hi  
10:39 <ClemensR> vmassol: hi  
10:39 <vmassol> question: shouldn't espressto be listed on http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/Support#HProfessionalSupport ?  
10:40 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
10:40 <vmassol> would you be interested in that?  
10:40 <ClemensR> yes, maybe, but I thought my boss should have a phone call with you about that first ...  
10:40 <ClemensR> and she never has time for anything lately ...  
10:40 <vmassol> actually it cannot be with me  
10:40 <vmassol> I'm not handling that  
10:40 <vmassol> :)  
10:40 <ClemensR> ah, ok :)  
10:40 <vmassol> it's not a XWiki SAS thing  
10:40 <vmassol> it's a community thing  
10:41 <vmassol> decided by the community  
10:41 <vmassol> the rule is defined here if you want to check it out:  
10:41 <vmassol> http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/Governance  
10:41 <ClemensR>  ah, I remember ..  
10:42 <ClemensR> something completely different: anyone minds if I cut a release for the Admin-tools ?  
10:43 <vmassol> no go ahead! it's good you're taking care of it  
10:43 <ClemensR> most open issues should be fixed, except for ADMINTOOL-12 , which kind depends on XWIKI-11645  
10:45 <msmeria1> has joined #xwiki  
10:47 <ClemensR> anyway, ok, I think I will release the admin-tools as 4.1 (as the jira says), not as 4.0.1  
10:48 <msmeria> has quit

14:06 <vmassol> FTR I've sent a request to log this xwiki channel to https://botbot.me/  
14:12 <tmortagne> looks indeed nice  
14:13 <evalica> https://botbot.me/freenode/xwiki/ momentan is empty  
14:14 <vmassol> oh cool it means they've started accepting my request maybe :)  
14:15 <vmassol> yes that's it  
14:15 <vmassol> because there's no #xwiki channel before  
14:15 <vmassol> (I had checked)  
14:15 <vmassol> :)  
14:15 <ClemensR> ah, yes, I see it in the stat page now, too :)

16:44 <xwikiorg\_guest\_5> has joined #xwiki  
16:44 <xwikiorg\_guest\_5> has quit  
16:47 <xwikiorg\_guest\_8> has joined #xwiki  
16:49 <xwikiorg\_guest\_8> Hello, When Wiki is public available (default), login as Admin, go to [XWiki] > [Administer Wiki] > [Rights] and then click [Logout] link in top right corner. Results in number of redirects (approx. 3), ending with a malformed URL and error 404:  
16:49 <xwikiorg\_guest\_8> QUESTION  Does anyone recognizes this behaviour and how can XWiki / Tomcat be configured to prevent this from happening?  
16:54 <xwikiorg\_guest\_8> Example: http://example.com:8580/wikihttp://example.com:8580/wiki/bin/login/XWiki/XWikiLogin?srid=SMqp8QUX&xredirect=/wiki/bin/admin/XWiki/XWikiPreferences%3Feditor%3Dglobaladmin%26section%3DRights  
16:55 <ClemensR> I remember a problem like that ... does it help to clear cookies ?  Are there error messages in the tomcat logs ?  
17:00 <jonitrythall> has joined #xwiki  
17:03 <jonitrythall> Hi there! I'm with botbot.me and we had a request to log this channel. We take privacy very seriously and cannot move forward without OP confirmation. Is there an OP around to confirm or deny this logging request?  
17:05 <cjd> vmassol: all you  
17:06 <lucaa1> has quit  
17:06 <Lyes> has quit  
17:06 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
17:06 <cjd> my gut feeling is it's ok, we're about wiki so we love transparency ... but vmassol is the guy to ask  
17:06 <silverdrop> has quit  
17:08 <jonitrythall> perfect. I will hang out for a bit then. thanks!  
17:09 <ClemensR> I guess vmassol has a phone call currently, and meeds a moment to check. Feel free to hang out a bit, thanks !  
17:11 <xwikiorg\_guest\_8> has quit  
17:17 <jonitrythall> will do :)  
17:24 <vmassol> jonitrythall: I'm back  
17:24 <vmassol> thanks a lot for accepting our request  
17:24 <vmassol> :)  
17:25 <vmassol> (yes I was otp sorry)  
17:25 <jonitrythall> Of course! Perfect, I will get started :)  
17:25 <vmassol> and thanks for checking us out!  
17:30 <[d\_\_d]> has joined #xwiki  
17:30 <jonitrythall> [d\_\_d] ping  
17:30 <[d\_\_d]> Are you in need of my services, jonitrythall?  
17:30 <jonitrythall> [d\_\_d] help  
17:30 <[d\_\_d]> Available plugins: logger, ping, last\_seen, help, bangmotivate (https://botbot.me/freenode/xwiki/help/)  
17:30 <jonitrythall> vmassol, you will want to add this to the topic URL: https://botbot.me/freenode/xwiki/  
17:31 <vmassol> ok thanks, will do  
17:33 <jonitrythall> Please feel free to reach out to us at [[email protected]](https://dev.xwiki.org/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection) with any questions, issues, or feedback!  
17:33 <vmassol> ok great, thanks again  
17:33 <cjd> .ping  
17:33 <cjd> %ping  
17:33 <cjd> what's it's trigger?  
17:33 <cjd> supy?  
17:33 <vmassol> https://botbot.me/freenode/xwiki/help/  
17:33 <vmassol> ping  
17:34 <vmassol> [d\_\_d]: ping  
17:34 <[d\_\_d]> Are you in need of my services, vmassol?  
17:34 <vmassol> :)  
17:34 <jonitrythall> has left #xwiki  
17:36 <cjd> [d\_\_d]: last\_seen lucaa  
17:36 <cjd> [d\_\_d]: help last\_seen  
17:36 <[d\_\_d]> Tracks when a user was last seen online.  
17:36 <[d\_\_d]> More details: https://botbot.me/freenode/xwiki/help/#last\_seen  
17:38 <vmassol> sdumitriu: ping
